trans-unit.source: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: Representa dados de progresso relatados em uma operação assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties that describe progress for the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe contém propriedades que descrevem o andamento para o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Not every property in this class applies to each event.
trans-unit.target: Não todas as propriedades desta classe se aplica a cada evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> representam o número total de bytes baixados para data e o número total de bytes na operação de download, respectivamente; elas se aplicam a todos os três eventos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> names the file group corresponding to the current <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event, and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflects the current stage of the download operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> nomes de grupo de arquivos correspondente ao atual <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> evento, e <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.State%2A> reflete o estágio atual da operação de download.

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz o download de um grupo de arquivos chamado `HelpFiles`, e exibe baixar progresso na barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você implantar um aplicativo do Windows Forms e que o formulário principal tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> controle chamado `downloadStatus`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de bytes já baixados por essa operação.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> representing the data already transferred, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> que representa os dados já transferidos, em bytes.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesCompleted%2A> propriedade refere-se para o download do manifesto de implantação.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se para o andamento do download de toda a atualização, incluído os arquivos de dados, assemblies e manifestos.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao andamento do download de todo o conjunto de arquivos que fazem parte de um grupo nomeado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz o download de um grupo de arquivos chamado `HelpFiles`, e exibe baixar progresso na barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você implantar um aplicativo do Windows Forms e que o formulário principal tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> controle chamado `downloadStatus`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número total de bytes na operação de download.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> representing the total size of the download, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Int64" /> que representa o tamanho total do download, em bytes.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>, o <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.BytesTotal%2A> propriedade refere-se para o download do manifesto de implantação.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>, a propriedade refere-se para o andamento do download de toda a atualização, incluído os arquivos de dados, assemblies e manifestos.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>, a propriedade se refere ao andamento do download de todo o conjunto de arquivos que fazem parte de um grupo nomeado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz o download de um grupo de arquivos chamado `HelpFiles`, e exibe baixar progresso na barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você implantar um aplicativo do Windows Forms e que o formulário principal tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> controle chamado `downloadStatus`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do grupo de arquivo sendo baixado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync" />; otherwise, a zero-length string.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o nome do grupo de arquivos, se o evento ocorreu como resultado de uma chamada para <see cref="Overload:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync" />; caso contrário, uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate multiple calls to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> and download multiple file groups simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: Você pode iniciar várias chamadas para <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> e baixar vários grupos de arquivos ao mesmo tempo.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> para determinar quais eventos retornos de chamada correspondem a qual grupo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz o download de um grupo de arquivos chamado `HelpFiles`, e exibe baixar progresso na barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você implantar um aplicativo do Windows Forms e que o formulário principal tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> controle chamado `downloadStatus`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ação que o processo está executando atualmente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState" /> value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressState" /> valor, indicando que o elemento ou elementos a operação está baixando.

trans-unit.source: The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir faz o download de um grupo de arquivos chamado `HelpFiles`, e exibe baixar progresso na barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> control named `downloadStatus`.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo requer que você implantar um aplicativo do Windows Forms e que o formulário principal tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> controle chamado `downloadStatus`.
